translations.landing.index.counter.recordOnceDesc: Show Flyto2 how you work. It learns by watching your clicks and keystrokes.
translations.landing.index.counter.replayForeverDesc: Run it again with different data. Batch process hundreds of items.
translations.landing.index.counter.stayInControlDesc: Pause, verify, and resume anytime. Never worry about runaway automation.
translations.landing.index.cta.noApiStart: When there's no API, only a browser —
translations.landing.index.different.errorBottom: Automation doesn't have to be "all or nothing."
translations.landing.index.different.quoteStart: Before, during, and when errors occur — you can always
translations.landing.index.different.step1Desc: Check if it's correct before processing more. Test safely.
translations.landing.index.different.step2Desc: Validate with a larger batch. Catch edge cases early.
translations.landing.index.different.step3Desc: Once confirmed, process the full batch with confidence.
translations.landing.index.different.subtitle: Most automation tools only have two states: not running or finished.
translations.landing.index.finalCta.quote: "An automation tool that follows your demonstration, but never goes rogue."
translations.landing.index.finalCta.title: Think of Flyto2 as:
translations.landing.index.hero.description: Flyto2 is an automation tool that operates your computer like a human. Open browsers, click buttons, fill forms, upload files. You do it once, Flyto2 repeats it forever.
translations.landing.index.noCoding.bottomStart: You don't need to know code. You just need to know
translations.landing.index.noCoding.step1Desc: Start Flyto2 and begin recording your workflow
translations.landing.index.noCoding.step2Desc: Work as you normally would - click, type, navigate
translations.landing.index.noCoding.step3Desc: Flyto2 captures and remembers every step
translations.landing.index.noCoding.step4Desc: Run it again, batch process, or schedule it
translations.landing.index.noCoding.subtitle: If you can use a browser, you can use Flyto2.
translations.landing.index.philosophy.line1: Flyto2 isn't about "letting the robot run wild."
translations.landing.index.philosophy.quote: You decide. The computer executes. Problems stop immediately.
translations.landing.index.safety.auditDesc: Screenshots and logs for everything. Know what happened, when, and by whom.
translations.landing.index.safety.rollbackDesc: Errors don't mean starting over. Go back and continue.
translations.landing.index.safety.subtitle: Flyto2 is designed for those who need to be careful.
translations.landing.index.safety.trialDesc: Test with a few items first before running the full batch.
translations.landing.index.safety.verifyDesc: See exactly what happens at each step before proceeding.
translations.landing.index.whoFor.adminDesc: Data entry, backend operations, report generation
translations.landing.index.whoFor.regulatedDesc: Finance, healthcare, government — full control required
translations.landing.index.why.bottomText: You know the process. You know it shouldn't take human effort. Flyto2 is built for exactly this.
translations.landing.index.why.copyPasteDesc: Logging into dashboards, copying data from one system to another, day after day.
translations.landing.index.why.noApiDesc: The system has no API. Your only option is clicking through the browser manually.
translations.landing.index.why.noBatchDesc: Your ERP or admin panel only lets you process one item at a time. No bulk actions.
translations.landing.index.why.subtitle: Many tasks aren't hard, they're just tedious.
translations.landing.index.why.title: Why
